from vpython import *

# Initialize
Length_I = 10
Radius_I = 1
g = 9.8
theta = 60 * pi / 180

# Create pendulum
ceiling = box(length=0.2, height=0.2, width=0.2, color=color.blue)
ball = sphere(radius=Radius_I, color=color.red)
rod = cylinder(radius=0.01)

# Animation
t = 0
dt = 0.01
while True:
    rate(100)
    ball.pos = vector(Length_I * sin(theta * cos(sqrt(g / Length_I) * t)), -Length_I * cos(theta * cos(sqrt(g / Length_I) * t)), 0)
    
    # Change the radius of the ball
    Radius_I += 0.01
    ball.radius = Radius_I
    
    rod.axis = ball.pos
    t += dt
